mapper.sql: id, hostip, servername, port, title, rule, content, watchtime, jmxtime
mapper.select: SELECT hostip FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT hostip FROM message) t ORDER BY hostip
SELECT port FROM (SELECT DISTINCT port FROM message WHERE hostip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) aa ORDER BY port

SELECT m1.hostip,m1.servername,m1.port,m1.title,DATE_FORMAT(m1.jmxtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') jmxtime,m2.val FROM message m1 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT id,val FROM ( SELECT id, CASE WHEN locate('HoggingThreadCount = ', content) != 0 THEN SUBSTRING_INDEX(content, 'HoggingThreadCount = ', -1) ELSE '0' END val FROM message WHERE 1 = 1 AND title LIKE '%独占线程%' AND jmxtime >= now() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE ) t WHERE val > 20) m2 ON m1.id = m2.id
mapper.insert:
insert into message
id,
hostip,
servername,
port,
title,
rule,
content,
watchtime,
jmxtime,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{hostip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{watchtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jmxtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update message
hostip = #{hostip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
servername = #{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
watchtime = #{watchtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jmxtime = #{jmxtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update message set hostip = #{hostip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, servername = #{servername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule = #{rule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, watchtime = #{watchtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jmxtime = #{jmxtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
